description: Whether you're spending lazy Sundays at home or weekends camping out with friends, the Men's Fairfax Novelty Heathered Flannel is your go-to, classically stylish flannel perfect for all-around fall fun. Stay warm and extra comfy in this breathable flannel blend, double brushed for a rich buttery softness. Designed to go with just about anything in your closet—from your favorite denim jeans to your trusted Marmot hiking bottoms—this Fairfax Flannel is a must-have for cooler weather adventures on and off the trail.
name: Marmot Fairfax Novelty Heathered Lightweight Flannel LS - Mens
